info.name: autohide the menu & sidebar [New York Daily News]
info.description: Hides the NYDN header, footer, and sidebar. (But not permanently - hover at the edges of the screen to restore them.)
info.additionalInfo:
The blue bars at the left edge of the screen are the collapsed header, sidebar, and footer. Mouse over them to restore the element.
